news.title: Justia Featured Resources: Justia Dockets Offering Info on AI Lawsuits
news.description: It’s often hard to fit new technologies into long-standing laws. A recent example is generative AI programs, which have spurred copyright lawsuits in federal courts. Justia Dockets lets you keep up to date with the latest in litigation.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: LGBTQ+ Legal Resource Center
news.description: LGBTQ+ people have faced discrimination in many areas, ranging from workplaces to schools to healthcare facilities. Our LGBTQ+ Legal Resource Center discusses the victories that this community has won and the obstacles that they still confront.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Animal & Dog Law Center
news.description: A bond between person and pet can resemble a bond between people. However, the benefits of pet ownership come with certain burdens. The Animal and Dog Law Center at Justia assists pet owners and people harmed by others’ pets.
